title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier.
2. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin export to zip file.

Results:
An error message box pops up: "Problems were encountered during export", and the detail lists the file of the same name in project2 as the problem (i.e., foo.txt in project 2).

Expected Behavior:
The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
OB: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file results in an error message during export, specifically when the file 'foo.txt' exists in both projects.
EB: When the file 'foo.txt' in project 2 is renamed to 'foo2.txt', the export process completes successfully without encountering any problems.
